title: California Chiropractors Exempt From State Requirement for Vaccine - HJ Ross Company
author: Sam
description: Department of Health has issued mandatory vaccines for doctor's offices. However, this order does have exemptions which include chiropractic offices. See the link below for full details. https://www.cdph.ca.gov/Programs/CID/DCDC/Pages/COVID-19/Unvaccinated-Workers-in-High-Risk-Settings-State-Public-Health-Order-FAQ.aspx What facilities/offices are not covered under this Order? Acupuncture Read more...
cleaned_text: Department of Health has issued mandatory vaccines for doctor's offices. However, this order does have exemptions which include chiropractic offices. See the link below for full details. https://www.cdph.ca.gov/Programs/CID/DCDC/Pages/COVID-19/Unvaccinated-Workers-in-High-Risk-Settings-State-Public-Health-Order-FAQ.aspx What facilities/offices are not covered under this Order? - Acupuncture office - Chiropractic office - Naturopathic doctor office - Occupational therapy office - Optometry office - Outpatient physical, speech, occupational therapy offices - Pharmacies - Podiatry office - First aid offices (e.g., at a resort or theme park)
